item.title: Welcome To My Blog!
item.description: Hi Welcome to my Blog! I am Ethan Morgan and here are some of my notes! I currently work at Amazon in their AGI lab in San Francisco. I am currently working under the recently acquired org from Adept AI (here).

item.title: Mamba - Linear-Time Sequence Modeling with Selective State Spaces Notes

item.description: Core Ideas: State Space Models (SSM) in Neural Networks: SSMs are used to model the relationship between input, output, and the internal state of a system ...

item.title: Gaussian (Normal) Distribution
item.description: Mean Vector \mu the mean vector represents the central point or the expected value of the distribution, you can have multiple dimensions for a mean vector which would be like \mu=[\mu_1,\mu_2] ...

item.title: Learning ML Resources
item.description: OpenAI Spinning Up in Deep RL Jacob Hilton Deep Learning Curriculum this one is quite open ended and has lots of experiments to do it yourself. it does point to some good resources for the prerequisites needed to understand the material.

item.title: My Journey: High School to Amazon
LoRa: Low Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models Paper Review
item.description: LoRa: Low Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models Paper Review Here is the paper I will be writing about today. LoRa: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models Paper 1.

item.title: The 2023 AWS Layoffs and Personal Insights
item.description: In an unprecedented turn of events, Amazon Web Services (AWS) recently faced a round of layoffs. This is a first in the history of AWS, marking a break from the past when even the tumultuous times of the 2008 financial crisis saw no layoffs at Amazon.

item.title: I felt the World Change: The Release of ChatGPT
item.description: On December 1st, 2022, I watch the world change. As I sat in front of my computer, I couldn’t believe my eyes. As I continued to use chatGPT, I was struck by how intuitive and user-friendly it was.
